Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. This product is not just an item, but a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering the unique benefits it offers, I'm extending you a special introductory offer of $200. This price includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, where if you're not completely satisfied, you can return the product for a full refund. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
